title: VPN Tunnels: Encrypted Passages Through the Internet
description: One-minute skill: VPN Tunnels: Encrypted Passages Through the Internet.

hook.text: Corporate VPNs create an encrypted tunnel through the public internet â€” like a private highway inside a busy road.

buildup.text: VPNs encrypt all traffic between your device and the corporate network. Even on public Wi-Fi, the data is protected.

discovery.text: IPsec and WireGuard create secure tunnels at the network layer. Everything passing through is encrypted.

twist.text: VPNs create a trusted tunnel, but if the endpoint is compromised, the tunnel becomes a highway for attackers into.

climax.text: VPNs extend the network perimeter to wherever you are â€” bringing both connectivity and risk.

punchline.text: A VPN is a secure tunnel. But tunnels go both ways.

quiz.question: What is a security risk of corporate VPNs?
options: They're too slow for video calls
